node_info.eventTriggerDescription: Waiting for you to submit the form
node_info.activationMessage: You can now make calls to your production Form URL.
node_info.description: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow
node_info.name: formTrigger

properties.name: options
properties.description: The text displayed to users after they filled the form

options.name: formSubmittedText
options.description: The text displayed to users after they filled the form

properties.name: path
properties.description: The final segment of the form's URL, both for test and production

properties.name: formTitle
properties.description: Shown at the top of the form

properties.name: formDescription
properties.description: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.
properties.placeholder: e.g. We'll get back to you soon

properties.name: responseMode
properties.description: As soon as this node receives the form submission

options.name: Form Is Submitted
options.description: As soon as this node receives the form submission

options.name: Workflow Finishes
options.description: When the last node of the workflow is executed

options.name: Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node
options.description: When the 'Respond to Webhook' node is executed

subProperties.name: formSubmittedText
subProperties.description: The text displayed to users after they filled the form

possibleValues.name: Form Is Submitted
possibleValues.description: As soon as this node receives the form submission

possibleValues.name: Workflow Finishes
possibleValues.description: When the last node of the workflow is executed

possibleValues.name: Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node
possibleValues.description: When the 'Respond to Webhook' node is executed

placeholders.text: e.g. We'll get back to you soon

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

settings.note: Trigger nodes only have common settings (notes, notesInFlow)
